resources.string: {"Title":"Android","Year":"1982","Rated":"PG","Released":"01 Oct 1982","Runtime":"80 min","Genre":"Sci-Fi","Director":"Aaron Lipstadt","Writer":"James Reigle, Don Keith Opper, Will Reigle (based on an original idea by)","Actors":"Klaus Kinski, Don Keith Opper, Brie Howard, Norbert Weisser","Plot":"Strange doctor secretly experiments with androids on his space station.
